category.name: Machine Learning
category.description: I have got a chance to work on various projects in my Master's journey and professional life. Along with that, curiosity to learn has led me to explore other repositories on Github.  Few of those projects are explained as tutorials or blogs in this section!

nodes.title: Naive Bayes Classifier
nodes.subtitle: What's so Naive about it?
nodes.description: Understand the basics of Naive Bayes using python.

nodes.title: Let us play with emotions
nodes.description: Fine-tuning BERT tutorial with PyTorch for emotion classification.

nodes.title: Using Machine Learning to detect fake news!
nodes.description: Develop a machine learning model to identify when an article might be fake news.
